channel.title: BUhealthAndWellness
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUhealthAndWellness, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Can Yoga Help Ease Depression and Anxiety?
item.description: Yoga is a powerful tool for managing stress, but can it also help with depression and anxiety? Learn how mindful movement and breathing may support yo...

item.title: Armpit Detox: Is It A Myth, Reality, Or Something Else Entirely?
item.description: Do you really need to "detox" your pits? We look into it.

item.title: I'm A Biotech Scientist & This Is What You Should Know About Skin Care
item.description: In this episode of Clean Beauty School, we go into detail about the microbiome, how to support it, and so much more. Tune in here.

item.title: Have Oily Skin? 4 Foods To Cut Out & What To Eat Instead, From An RD
item.description: Topicals are important, but you might want to consider approaching your oily skin internally as well.

item.title: How Smoking Raises Your Cancer Risk
3 Pregnancy-Safe Skin Care Myths This Derm & New Mom Wants To Debunk
item.description: "If there's any time to invest in yourself, it's during pregnancy."

item.title: Are Bone Broth & Stock Really Different? Here's What An RD Says
item.description: Turns out it's just an issue of labels.

item.title: 14 Ways to Make Your Feet Feel Better
